about_the_game:
Tales of Miravia is a fantasy role-playing game where players take on the role of a hero destined to purify corrupted statues and restore balance in the world of Miravia.

Main Features:

  • Immersive Exploration: Dive into a detailed world with diverse maps and secrets to uncover.

  • Turn-based Strategic Combat: Face challenging enemies using tactics and unique abilities.

  • Varied Minigames: Enjoy side activities that enrich the gaming experience.

  • Dynamic Visual Effects: Experience changing weather, realistic shadows, and animations that intensify the action.

  • Engaging Story: Follow a deep narrative with memorable characters and unexpected twists.

Note: Tales of Miravia is constantly being developed. Your support and feedback are essential to improve and expand the game.
